All functions

examplomycin
Examplomycin Dataset
fitIRMC()
Fit aggregate data using Iterative Reweighting with Monte Carlo updates
gen_pop_EV()
Compute expected population-level mean and covariance

Generate a simulated dataset
genfitfunc()
Generate a fitting function for optimization

Generate options for aggregate data modeling

Compute mean and covariance of a matrix
omegas()
Create a covariance matrix with specified diagonal and off-diagonal values

Convert parameters to optimizable form
